greetings: Hello! How can I help you with your health today?
Hi! I'm HealthMitra, here to answer your health questions.
fever: Fever is usually a sign that your body is fighting an infection.
High fever should not be ignored. Consult a doctor if it persists.
headache: Headaches may be due to stress or dehydration.
Migraines can cause throbbing pain and sensitivity to light.
